titleStmt.title: A treatise of Christian religion. Or, the whole bodie and substance of diunintie. By T.C.
Christian religion
titleStmt.author: Cartwright, Thomas, 1535-1603.
Bradshaw, William, 1571-1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Thomas Man,

notesStmt.note: Editor's dedication signed: W.B., i.e. William Bradshaw.

Identified as STC 4313 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
